    • Method Detail

      • onResponse

        public void onResponse(retrofit2.Call<com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse> call,
                       retrofit2.Response<com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse> response)
        A new directions response has been received.

        The DirectionsResponse is validated. If navigation is running, MapboxNavigation is updated and reroute state is dismissed. If not, navigation is started.

        Specified by:
        onResponse in interface retrofit2.Callback<com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsResponse>
        Parameters:
        call - used to request the new DirectionsRoute
        response - contains the new DirectionsRoute
        Since:
        0.6.0

                              android.location.Location rawLocation)

      • extractRouteOptions

        public void extractRouteOptions(NavigationViewOptions options)
        Checks the options used to launch this NavigationView.

        Will launch with either a DirectionsRoute or pair of Points.

        Parameters:
        options - holds either a set of Point coordinates or a DirectionsRoute

      • fetchRouteNewOrigin

        public void fetchRouteNewOrigin(com.mapbox.geojson.Point newOrigin)
        Called when an off-route event is fired and a new DirectionsRoute is needed to continue navigating.
        Parameters:
        newOrigin - found from off-route event
